question:
Recommend the Great Wall in Beijing, with the title needing to be exactly 7 words, and the content around 200 words. The title should be attractive and can use trending vocabulary, hot memes, and popular expressions from social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, etc. It should make people have a strong desire to click and checkout what it is. Remember, the word number only counts the English words.
Note: Please only include English words. Moreover, Your response must contain at least 5 compound words, here compound words only refer to words like Mike's or follow-up, where each word has either a hyphen (-) or an apostrophe (') in the middle.

corresponding_parts.标题: 请你按照python list的格式，抓取模型回复中，给出的title部分。比如["Epic Canyon Vibes: Nature's Ultimate Flex"]
corresponding_parts.文案: 请你按照python list的格式，抓取模型回复中，给出的content部分。比如["The Grand Canyon isn't just a destination – it's literally the main character of America's natural wonders, and honestly, it hits different every single time you visit. This geological masterpiece in Arizona serves up the most incredible views that will have you questioning if you're still on planet Earth."]
